item.title: 尽管科技股走强，软银第四季度仍将出现亏损
item.description: 日本科技投资者软银集团（SoftBank Group）周一公布财报时，尽管包括其核心资产 Arm Holdings 公司在内的科技股在本季度表现良好，但预计将再次陷入亏损。【原文：Japanese technology investor SoftBank Group is expected to slip back into the red when it reports earnings on Monday despite technology stocks including Arm Holdings , , its core asset, performing well over the quarter.】

item.title: 美元顽强走强削弱美国公司的盈利喜悦
item.description: 许多美国公司今年都面临着一个他们未曾预料到的问题：美元升值。【原文：A host of U.S. companies are faced with a problem they had not expected to confront this year: a rising dollar.】

item.title: 早间竞标：降息希望激发风险反弹
item.description: 安库尔-班纳吉（Ankur Banerjee）对欧洲和全球市场未来一天的展望【原文：A look at the day ahead in European and global markets from Ankur Banerjee】

item.title: 据英国《金融时报》报道，Calpers 衡量对埃克森首席执行官投反对票的可能性
item.description: 据英国《金融时报》周五报道，美国最大的公共养老金计划 Calpers 正在考虑投票反对埃克森美孚首席执行官达伦-伍兹（Darren Woods）连任公司董事会成员。【原文：Calpers, the US’s biggest public pension plan, is considering a vote against ExxonMobil chief executive Darren Woods’ re-election to the company board, the Financial Times reported on Friday.】

item.title: 澳大利亚监管机构称马斯克的 X 不应设定互联网法律的限制
item.description: 网络监管机构的一名律师在有关一名主教被刺伤的视频听证会上说，埃隆-马斯克的 X 公司制定了相关政策，可以根据自己的选择删除有害内容，但在决定什么内容可以在那里观看时，不应该被允许凌驾于澳大利亚法律之上。【原文：Elon Musk's X has policies to take down harmful content when it chooses but should not be allowed to overrule Australian law in deciding what can be viewed there, a lawyer for the cyber regulator told a hearing into video of a bishop being stabbed.】

item.title: AFR 称，力拓曾考虑竞购必和必拓的目标公司英美资源集团
item.description: 据《澳大利亚金融评论报》周五报道，矿业巨头力拓曾考虑收购英国矿商英美资源集团（Anglo American），该集团目前是必和必拓集团 390 亿美元的收购目标。【原文：Mining giant Rio Tinto had considered an offer for British miner Anglo American , which is now BHP Group's $39 billion takeover target, the Australian Financial Review reported on Friday.】

item.title: 美国降息希望重燃，黄金将创下五周以来最佳表现
item.description: 近期的经济数据提振了对美联储降息的押注，金价周五走强，有望创下 4 月 5 日以来最好的一周。【原文：Gold prices firmed on Friday, poised for their best week since April 5, following recent economic data that boosted bets of an interest rate cut from the Federal Reserve.】

item.title: 全球降息乐观情绪再起，亚洲股市反弹
item.description: 周五，亚洲股市上涨，有望实现连续第三周上涨，而美元则出现回落，因为在下周关键的通胀数据公布之前，美国劳动力市场宽松的新迹象激起了市场对今年降息的乐观情绪。【原文：Asian stocks rose on Friday, on course for a third week of gains, while the dollar was on the back foot as fresh signs of an easing U.S. labour market stoked optimism around interest rate cuts this year ahead of next week's crucial inflation data.】

item.title: 不稳定降雨和停电打击了中国发展绿色铝业的雄心壮志
item.description: 中国西南部的降雨量变化无常，这使耗资数十亿美元的铝业绿化计划受挫，而铝业的产量几乎占全球总产量的 60%，据估计，铝业排放的二氧化碳比澳大利亚还多。【原文：Erratic rainfall in China's southwest is frustrating a multibillion-dollar push to green an aluminium industry that accounts for almost 60% of global output and, by some estimates, emits more carbon dioxide than Australia.】

item.title: 广告时代》称苹果为 iPad Pro "粉碎 "广告道歉
item.description: 据《广告时代》杂志报道，苹果公司周四为其最新 iPad Pro 机型发布了一则广告，广告中展示了乐器和其他创意象征被压碎的动画，引发了批评。【原文：Apple apologized on Thursday after an advertisement for its latest iPad Pro model sparked criticism by showing an animation of musical instruments and other symbols of creativity being crushed, Ad Age magazine reported.】

item.title: 彭博社报道：美国将对中国电动汽车和某些战略行业征收关税
item.description: 据彭博新闻社周四报道，拜登政府最快将于下周公布对华关税的全面决定，目标是针对电动汽车、电池和太阳能设备等行业。【原文：The Biden administration is set to unveil a sweeping decision on China tariffs as soon as next week with an aim to target sectors including electric vehicles, batteries and solar equipment, Bloomberg News reported on Thursday.】

item.title: 就业数据再次疲软，美元止跌回升
item.description: 由于美国数据显示劳动力市场有进一步降温的迹象，因此美联储今年降息的可能性增大，隔夜美元兑欧元和英镑下跌，周五亚市早盘美元走势疲软。【原文：The U.S. dollar had a soft tone in early Asian trading on Friday after losing ground overnight to the euro and sterling on the back of U.S. data showing further signs of a cooling labour market and hence higher odds of Fed rate cuts this year.】

item.title: 软银与 Naver 就 Line 运营商 LY 的控制权进行谈判
item.description: 软银首席执行官宫川淳一周四表示，这家日本电信公司正在与韩国 Naver 就 LY 公司的控制权进行谈判，该公司运营着流行的信息应用 Line。【原文：SoftBank CEO Junichi Miyakawa said on Thursday that the Japanese telecommunications firm is in talks with South Korea's Naver over control of LY Corp , which operates the popular messaging app Line.】

item.title: 华侨银行第一季度利润创纪录，出价 10 亿美元收购大东方私人公司
item.description: 新加坡第二大银行华侨银行（OCBC）周五公布第一季度利润增长5%，好于预期，并提出14亿新元（10.4亿美元）的收购要约，将其保险公司大东方私有化。【原文：Singapore's second-largest bank Oversea-Chinese Banking Corp (OCBC) posted on Friday a better-than-expected 5% rise in first-quarter profit and made a S$1.4 billion ($1.04 billion) offer to take its insurer arm Great Eastern private.】

item.title: 油价因中国数据走强和中东冲突而上涨
item.description: 由于中国经济出现改善迹象，以及以色列和哈马斯之间停止敌对行动的谈判没有取得任何结果，周五油价继续上扬。【原文：Oil prices rose on Friday, continuing upwards trend on the signs of improving economy in China and as negotiations to halt hostilities in the stand-off between Israel and Hamas yielded no results.】

item.title: 美国立法者推出法案，更容易限制人工智能模型出口
item.description: 一个由两党议员组成的小组在周三晚些时候公布了一项法案，该法案将使拜登政府更容易对人工智能模型实施出口管制，以保护美国珍贵的技术免受外国不良行为者的侵害。【原文：A bipartisan group of lawmakers unveiled a bill late Wednesday that would make it easier for the Biden administration to impose export controls on AI models, in a bid to safeguard the prized U.S. technology against foreign bad actors.】

item.title: 日本消费支出延续跌势，为日本央行加息前景蒙上阴影
item.description: 日本 3 月份的消费支出连续第 13 个月下降，这给决策者带来了挑战，因为他们正努力推动实际工资的强劲增长，而这是央行进一步加息的先决条件。【原文：Japan's consumer spending fell for the 13th straight month in March, creating challenges for policymakers who are seeking to drive stronger real wage growth, a prerequisite for additional central bank rate hikes.】

item.title: 为什么中国对廉价货币的容忍可能只是暂时的
item.description: 货币市场正在解读中国当局发出的微妙信号，这些信号表明他们正在缓慢压低人民币汇率，以恢复出口竞争力，但分析师们表示，人民币长期走软既不是意图，也不可取。【原文：Currency markets are reading subtle signals from Chinese authorities as an indication they are slowly nudging the yuan lower to regain export competitiveness, but analysts say protracted yuan weakening is neither the intent nor desirable.】

item.title: 据彭博新闻社报道，塔吉特将在 "骄傲月 "期间从部分商店撤下以 LGBTQ 为主题的商品
item.description: 据彭博新闻社周四报道，塔吉特（Target）计划在今年 6 月的 "骄傲月 "期间削减部分门店中以 LGBTQ 为主题的商品，去年该零售商的销售额曾因此遭到反弹。【原文：Target is planning to cut LGBTQ-themed merchandise from some of its stores during Pride Month this June, Bloomberg News reported on Thursday, after a backlash hit sales of the retailer last year.】

item.title: 消息人士称，OpenAI 计划于下周一公布谷歌搜索的竞争对手
item.description: 据两位熟知内情的消息人士透露，OpenAI 计划于下周一宣布其人工智能搜索产品，从而加大与搜索大王谷歌竞争的赌注。【原文：OpenAI plans to announce its artificial intelligence-powered search product on Monday, according to two sources familiar with the matter, raising the stakes in its competition with search king Google.】

item.title: 早间竞价：市场上涨但缺乏动力，中国通胀迫在眉睫
item.description: 亚洲市场前瞻【原文：A look at the day ahead in Asian markets.】

item.title: 拜登关注波音公司消防员停工事件
item.description: 美国总统乔-拜登（Joe Biden）周四表示，他对波音公司将其工会消防员拒之门外表示担忧，并向这家美国飞机制造商施压，要求其解决合同纠纷。【原文：U.S. President Joe Biden said on Thursday he is concerned that Boeing has locked out its unionized firefighters, raising pressure on the U.S. planemaker to resolve the contract dispute.】

item.title: 埃隆-马斯克可能被迫在美国证券交易委员会的推特收购调查中再次作证
item.description: 周四，一名联邦法官表示愿意强迫埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）再次就美国证券交易委员会（U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission）对其以 440 亿美元收购推特（Twitter）的调查作证。【原文：A federal judge on Thursday indicated a willingness to compel Elon Musk to testify again in the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission's investigation into his $44 billion takeover of Twitter.】

item.title: 据彭博法律报道，美国证券交易委员会正在调查波音公司有关其安全实践的声明
item.description: 据彭博法律周刊周四报道，美国证券交易委员会正在调查波音公司关于其安全实践的声明，因为今年 1 月阿拉斯加航空公司运营的一架 737 MAX 航班上的一块面板在空中爆炸。【原文：The U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission is investigating statements made by Boeing Co. about its safety practices after a panel blew out mid-air on a 737 MAX flight operated by Alaska Airlines in January, Bloomberg Law reported on Thursday.】

item.title: 美国邮政第二季度净亏损缩小至 15 亿美元
item.description: 美国邮政服务公司（United States Postal Service）周四报告称，截至 3 月 31 日的第二季度净亏损为 15 亿美元，而去年同期净亏损为 25 亿美元。【原文：The United States Postal Service on Thursday reported a net loss of $1.5 billion for the second quarter ended March 31, compared to a net loss of $2.5 billion a year ago.】

item.title: 独家报道消息人士称，中国电动汽车制造商极客电动车在美国的首次公开募股（IPO）定价最高，将融资4.41亿美元
item.description: 一位熟悉内情的人士称，中国电动汽车制造商紫光智能科技周四在美国首次公开募股（IPO）的定价达到了预期区间的顶点，共募集资金4.41亿美元。【原文：Chinese electric vehicle maker Zeekr Intelligent Technology priced its U.S. initial public offering (IPO) at the top of its indicated range on Thursday, raising $441 million, a person familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 墨西哥 Bankaool 计划 2026 年登陆美国股市
item.description: 随着母公司 Grupo OMNi 寻求融资以资助该贷款机构的发展，一位高层管理人员表示，墨西哥贷款机构 Bankaool 预计将于 2026 年初在美国股市上市。【原文：Mexican lender Bankaool expects to debut on the U.S. stock market by early 2026, a top executive said, as parent company Grupo OMNi looks to raise money to fund the lender's growth.】

item.title: 西联汇款在中断 3 个月后恢复对古巴的汇款服务
item.description: 西联汇款公司（Western Union）周四证实，在三个多月前系统崩溃后，该公司已恢复了从美国到古巴的汇款服务，为古巴人及其在美国的亲友恢复了一条重要的生命线。【原文：Western Union confirmed on Thursday it had resumed its remittance service from the U.S. to Cuba after the system collapsed more than three months earlier, restoring a vital lifeline for Cubans and their friends and families in the U.S.】

item.title: 美国机构称特斯拉干扰纽约工厂工会组织工作
item.description: 特斯拉公司发言人周四表示，美国一家劳工机构指控特斯拉禁止纽约水牛城一家装配厂的工人使用手机和其他设备，从而阻止他们组织工会。【原文：Tesla has been accused by a U.S. labor agency of discouraging workers at a Buffalo, New York assembly plant from union organizing by barring them from using phones and other devices, an agency spokeswoman said on Thursday.】

item.title: 福特考虑 2030 年后在欧洲提供汽油车和混合动力车
item.description: 底特律汽车制造商福特汽车周四表示，福特汽车正考虑在2030年以后在欧洲推出汽油车和混合动力车，这改变了该公司最初在欧洲推出全电动车阵容的计划。【原文：Ford Motor is considering offering gas-powered vehicles and hybrids beyond 2030 in Europe, a change from its initial plan for an all-electric lineup in the region, the Detroit automaker said on Thursday.】
